amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Secretary of Defense to assign up to 10,000 Department of Defense personnel at any one time to assist--(1) the Immigration and Naturalization Service in preventing the entry of terrorists, drug traffickers, and illegal aliens into the United States; and (2) the United States Customs Service in the inspection of cargo, vehicles, and aircraft at points of entry into the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to permit the Secretary of Defense to assign military personnel to assist Immigration and Natrualization Service and Customs Service to assist border patrol activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 119, 1 Present (Roll no. 224).
